title: 加拿大禁蒙面法vs香港禁蒙面法

replies.msg:
政府/ 建制人士話參考加拿大既例子黎訂立禁蒙面法，咁我睇下加拿大禁蒙面法究竟係點，發現而家香港既其實同加拿大既都有幾大既分別下。TLDR就只睇紅字

1. 兩者禁蒙面既情況不盡相同，分別係香港既禁蒙面法係包埋有不反對通知書既集會同遊行而加拿大只係針對非法集結同暴動

而家睇下香港條例點寫 –

Cap. 241K Prohibition on Face Covering Regulation

A person must not use any facial covering that is likely to prevent identification while the person is at—

(a)an unlawful assembly (whether or not the assembly is a riot within the meaning of section 19 of Cap. 245); (即是非法集結)
(b)an unauthorized assembly; (即是未經批准集結)
(c)a public meeting that—
(i)takes place under section 7(1) of Cap. 245; and
(ii)does not fall within paragraph (a) or (b); or (即是有不反對通知書既集會)
(d)a public procession that—
(i)takes place under section 13(1) of Cap. 245; and
(ii)does not fall within paragraph (a) or (b). (即是有不反對通知書既遊行)

簡單黎講，基本上所有遊行集會(有冇不反對都好)你都唔可以蒙面，否則就中左佢既禁蒙面法

咁而加拿大既禁蒙面法又係點 –

Criminal Code

Punishment of rioter (即是暴動)
(1) Every one who takes part in a riot is guilty of an indictable offence and liable to imprisonment for a term not exceeding two years.

Concealment of identity (即是隱藏身份，如蒙面)
(2) Every person who commits an offence under subsection (1) while wearing a mask or other disguise to conceal their identity without lawful excuse is guilty of an indictable offence and liable to imprisonment for a term not exceeding 10 years.
Punishment for unlawful assembly (即是非法集結)
(1) Every one who is a member of an unlawful assembly is guilty of an offence punishable on summary conviction.

Concealment of identity (即是隱藏身份，如蒙面)
(2) Every person who commits an offence under subsection (1) while wearing a mask or other disguise to conceal their identity without lawful excuse is guilty of (a) an indictable offence and liable to imprisonment for a term not exceeding five years; or (b) an offence punishable on summary conviction.

簡單講，即是係暴動或者非法集結既情況下先唔可以蒙面，佢並無規限係其他情況下集會既蒙面

2. 加拿大既立法先真係具阻嚇性，香港既除左阻和理非係有不反對通知書下戴口罩唔知仲可以阻乜

加拿大本身都有暴動同非法集結，兩條罪同香港既都好似，最大既唔同就係罰則

Criminal Code

Punishment of rioter (即是暴動)
(1) Every one who takes part in a riot is guilty of an indictable offence and liable to imprisonment for a term not exceeding two years. (最多2年)

Punishment for unlawful assembly (即是非法集結)
(1) Every one who is a member of an unlawful assembly is guilty of an offence punishable on summary conviction. (summary conviction最多6個月)

一但蒙面，罰則立即提升到蒙面暴動最多坐10年而蒙面非法集結最多坐5年。

但香港既罰則呢

A person who contravenes subsection (1) commits an offence and is liable on conviction to a fine at level 4 and to imprisonment for 1 year. (最多1年)

香港暴動本身都已經up to 10年，非法集結up to 5年，而禁蒙面法最多1年，除左嚇和理非諗唔到個logic係邊到。

另外都仲未講要學人地立法又唔學埋人地有民主，所以政府/ 建制唔好再扮晒野
